1657.text:
it or sometimes you don’t think you’re
doing enough.

1662.text:
What you’ve just seen is a small glimpse
of some of what God is doing around the world

1667.text:
through the Answers broadcast. Those of you
that support what we’re doing, I want to

1672.text:
say thank you; and to those of you that perhaps
haven’t supported us, please pray about

1677.text:
it. The apostle Paul said “I desire fruit
that abounds to your account.” Friend, all

1682.text:
of the lives that are touched; all of the
souls that come into the kingdom; they literally

1686.text:
go to your account when you support God’s
work. And what you’ve seen, just a tip of

1692.text:
the iceberg, we’ll never truly know until
we get to heaven, all that God has done. So

1702.text:
Thank you for watching Answers with Bayless
Conley. For more information and inspiration,
